data.text: @BenBSinger #DeathBattle My second one is Michael Jackson VS Elvis Presley because they are the most popular musicians of all time until their death. https://t.co/cfvjEMSv2C

@BenBSinger Andrew Jackson VS Teddy Roosevelt because they are the 2 most badass presidents of all time and they've also accomplished a lot of feats which are really crazy which is why it makes them badass. #DeathBattle https://t.co/UghOm1McCm
@BenBSinger After reading the latest blog I just read, I know a 2 real life Death Battles that you could definitely match. #DeathBattle
@CJ_CrushingC_R @BenBSinger Then lookup CSI - episodes 1 and 15 of season 11 and you see from where a certain clip is from.
@BenBSinger Regarding real life people in Death Battle, I'd be partial to El Santo vs. Wong Fei Hung
@BenBSinger No idea who I would want to fight him, but Dwayne “The Rock” Johnson HAS to get in there at some point
@BenBSinger That #DEATHBATTLE! made me yearn for the days of Celebrity DeathMatch. You know, before the... unfortunate reboot on MTV2.
@StevenMooreXD @BenBSinger Shaq-Fu universe Shaq vs. Shut up and Jam Gaiden universe Barkley would be great!
@BenBSinger All in flavor to have Shaquille O'Neal VS Charles Barkley as a real world gag battle say "Gold Bond" or any other reference from these 2 huge basketball players.
@BenBSinger I have to ask, were those Scott Pilgrim sprites with the heads imposed on them?

@BenBSinger I remember being a really cynical 14 year old when I saw this the year it launched, who despised both of these people.  Now that I’m older I don’t care anymore but this was very therapeutic for me being at that age.  & even today I still laugh.  ...Man, I’m a sick person.

@BenBSinger I can honestly say this is one of the few Death Battles I've never watched. It might actually be the only one, I have to check.

As for future "real people" episodes, you already did Chuck Norris vs. Segata Sanshiro, and you did that one epically. Why try and top it? lol
@BenBSinger This one will always be one of the weirded fights ever simply because of the absurdity f it all. I like it
